notes.title: Complete the code
notes.details:
<Card elevation={2}>
                <CardHeader 
                    avatar={
                        <Avatar
                            sx = {{bgcolor: avatarColor[note.category]}}
                        >
                            {note.category[0].toUpperCase()}
                        </Avatar>
                }
                    action = {
                        <IconButton
                            onClick={() => handleDelete(note.id)}
                        >
                            <DeleteOutlined />
                        </IconButton>
                    }
                    title={note.title}
                    subheader={note.category}
                />
